page.title: 19 ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND
page.content:
This super exciting playground is the best play area for miles around and it is free. The playground is provided so that shopper's children can play instead of hanging around mum and dad.
In the playground there is a magnificent pirate ship which is big enough for a 100 children. There is a real looking army tank and an army truck. One frame that looks like a rugby ball is fun but it can be frightening and dangerous. There are the usual activities like slides, swings and tractor tyres. The most thrilling activities are the most dangerous ones.
In the week the playground is deserted but at the week end it is absolutely packed.
